item.title: Equifax Update: More Breaches, More Lies
item.description: You will be mad. You probably don’t have a contract with Equifax. Your creditors do. When you apply for a loan, you give creditors permission to: *1. Obtain your credit file. *2. Update your credit file. You expect that creditors vet their vendors, don’t you? You assume banks and credit card companies test their vendors’ security. And you expect financial services companies like Equifax to be on the up and up.
